DeleteEventArgs.summary: This class we allow usea event for a determinate message in this case when delete a person.

PersonaResult.summary: This ImmutableList contains all person in database next to make delete.

ReplicasResult.summary: This Dictionary contains all response for all replicas in the system.

FinalStatus.summary: This Property is useful for know the status for this operation.

DeleteEventArgsC.summary: Constructor that allow save a list of person to send the event .
DeleteEventArgsC.param: This parameter represent the result for this operation
